T02D1491:202b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra s'a dha nam /
T02D1491:202b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1491:202b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1491:202b-5: nang par tho rangs kyi dus su stan bde ba
T02D1491:202b-6: la 'dug ste rang yi dam gyi lha bsgom par
T02D1491:202b-7: bya'o // bdag nyid he ru ka'i nga rgyal dang
T02D1491:202b-8: ldan pas tshad med pa bzhi rim gyis bsgoms la
T02D1491:202b-9: bya'o // / phung po lnga'i brgyal bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1491:202b-10: gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1491:202b-11: tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D1491:202b-12: 'du shes kyi phung po ni snang ba mtha' yas dang /
T02D1491:202b-13: 'du byed kyi phung po ni don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1491:202b-14: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1491:202b-15: de thams cad kyi bdag gnyid du gyur pa ni dpal he ru ka'o ;
T02D1491:202b-16: / de nas rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1491:202b-17: 'khor gyi ste du yi ge h'um nag po bsams
T02D1491:202b-18: la / de las 'od zer 'phros te slar 'dus pa las /
T02D1491:202b-19: bdag nyid khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog thing gzhal gsum pa phyag drug pa /
T02D1491:202b-22: phyag dang po gnyis kyis h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin cing /
T02D1491:202b-23: rang snang gi rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1491:202b-24: g-yon kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1491:202b-25: g-yas lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1491:202b-26: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan par bsgom mo //
T02D1491:202b-27: de nas su mtha'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D1491:203a-0: aom su mbha ni su mbha @203a * //
T02D1491:203a-2: aom gri hni grahna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:203a-3: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:203a-4: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na bi dy'a d'a dza ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:203a-5: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na phat /
T02D1491:203a-6: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02D1491:203a-7: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1491:203a-8: sarbba bighn'am k'a ya b'a ka rtsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1491:203a-9: aom badzra mu dha ra badzra k'i la ya aa ko ta ya aa ko ta yi h'um phat /
T02D1491:203a-10: ces bya ba'i sngags kyis bgegs rnams bskrad la /
T02D1491:203a-11: rdo rje ra ba la sogs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1491:203a-12: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa sngon du
T02D1491:203a-13: 'gro bas stong ba nyid du bsgom par bar bya'o
T02D1491:203a-14: // de nas stong ba nyid kyi ngang las thig
T02D1491:203a-15: le dkar po yungs kar gyi tshad tsam bsam mo
T02D1491:203a-16: // // de nas yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1491:203a-17: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor ram gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1491:203a-18: de'i sten du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor bam gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1491:203a-19: de'i steng du lam las dbang chen sa'i dkyil 'khor lam gyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1491:203a-20: de'i steng du sum las ri'i rgyal po ri rab
T02D1491:203a-21: zung bzhi pa rin po che sna lnga'i rang bzhin
T02D1491:203a-22: can lcog chen po brgyad kyis mdzes par byas pa
T02D1491:203a-23: / de'i steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D1491:203a-24: de'i steng du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D1491:203a-25: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ;
T02D1491:203a-26: de'i steng du mngon par byang chub ba'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D1491:203a-27: brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha bcu gsum skad cig gis bsam mo //
T02D1491:203a-28: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das zhal ba zhing /
T02D1491:203a-29: sku mdog mthing ga / spyan gsum pa /
T02D1491:203a-30: phyag bcu gnyis / g-yas brkyang ba'i rnam pas bzhugs
T02D1491:203a-31: pas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs kyis
T02D1491:203a-32: mnan pa / rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje drul bu bsnams pa /
T02D1491:203a-33: steng gi phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1491:203a-34: g-yas pa'i gsum pa na cang te'u /
T02D1491:203a-35: bzhi pa ni gri gug / lnga pa na dgra sta dang ;
T02D1491:203a-36: drug pa na mdung rtse gsum ba 'phyar ba /
T02D1491:203a-37: g-yon gyi phyag gsum pa na kha tv'am ga rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02D1491:203a-38: bzhi pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa /
T02D1491:203a-39: lnga pa na rdo rje zhags pa /
T02D1491:203a-40: drug pa na tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i chang ba /
T02D1491:203a-41: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1491:203b-0: dbul thod pa'i phreng ba dang zla ba @203b phyed pas mtshan pa /
T02D1491:203b-1: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i cod pan can zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1491:203b-2: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1491:203b-3: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D1491:203b-4: dbus mthing ga / zhal g-yas ser ba /
T02D1491:203b-5: nub padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra ba /
T02D1491:203b-6: g-yon marga ta lta bu'i mdog dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1491:203b-7: stag gi pags pa'i shas thabs can /
T02D1491:203b-8: mi mgo'i phreng brgyu ma dang bcas pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1491:203b-12: spyi gtsug gi nor bus brgyan pa /
T02D1491:203b-14: thal ba dang phyag rgya drug ste pha rol tu
T02D1491:203b-15: phyin pa drug rnam par dag pas phyag rgya drug
T02D1491:203b-17: de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo /
T02D1491:203b-21: gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i skar gas can /
T02D1491:203b-22: g-yon ba 'khyud pa'i phyag gis gdug pa la sogs pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'chang ba /
T02D1491:203b-23: g-yas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gri gug phyogs thams cad
T02D1491:203b-24: du 'jigs par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi sdigs mdzub
T02D1491:203b-25: can bskal ba'i me bzhin 'jigs pa che /
T02D1491:203b-26: khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud pa /
T02D1491:203b-27: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid bsgom /
T02D1491:203b-28: phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi //
T02D1491:203b-29: sgo bzhir khva gdong ma la sogs pa bzhi /
T02D1491:203b-30: mtshams bzhir gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi /
T02D1491:203b-31: thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa /
T02D1491:203b-32: g-yon kha tv'am ga dang thod pa /
T02D1491:203b-33: g-yas da ma ru dang gri gug bsnams pa'o //
T02D1491:203b-34: rnal 'byor ma de dag kyang yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1491:203b-35: de dag gi dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang phyag rgya lngas brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D1491:203b-36: de nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1491:203b-37: mgo la aom dkar po dang /
T02D1491:203b-38: lkog mar a'a: dmar po dang /
T02D1491:203b-39: num gnyis kyi bar du h'um nag po dang /
T02D1491:203b-40: thugs kar h'um sngon po bsam bar bya'o //
T02D1491:203b-41: de nas yi ge bzhi las 'od zer 'phros te
T02D1491:203b-42: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1491:203b-43: gsung thugs ye shes sems dpa' dang thugs rdo rje
T02D1491:203b-44: bskul te / yi ge bzhi la so sor thim par bsam mo //
T02D1491:204a-1: h'um aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya
T02D1491:204a-2: w'a ka rtsi tta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&
T02D1491:204a-3: ham / aom badzra shuddha: sarbba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D1491:204a-4: zhes brjod pas brgyal brtan par bya'o //
T02D1491:204a-5: de nas go cha gnyis brtan par bya ste he ru ka'i thugs kar aom ha dkar po /
T02D1491:204a-6: dbu la na ma hi ser po /
T02D1491:204a-7: spyi gtsug tu sv'a h'a hu dmar po /
T02D1491:204a-8: phrag pa gnyis su boo sha ta he nag po /
T02D1491:204a-9: mig gnyis su h'um h'um ho dmar po /
T02D1491:204a-10: yan lag kun la mtshon cha ni phat ham ljang gu'o //
T02D1491:204a-11: yum gyi lte ba la aom ban dmar mo /
T02D1491:204a-12: thugs kar ham yom nag mo /
T02D1491:204a-13: zhal du hrim mom dkar mo /
T02D1491:204a-14: dbu la hrom hrim ser mo /
T02D1491:204a-15: spyi gtsug tu h'um h'um ljang gu /
T02D1491:204a-16: yin lag thams cad la phat phat du ba'i mdog can bsam par bya'o //
T02D1491:204a-17: de ltar dam tshigs sems dpa' bskyed nas /
T02D1491:204a-18: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba ni sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D1491:204a-19: sngags kyis mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo //
T02D1491:204a-20: snying po'i phyag rgya bstan te lag pa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa bskor zhing /
T02D1491:204a-22: zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor ba dang gnyis su med par byas nas /
T02D1491:204a-23: aom yo ga shuddha: sarbba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1491:204a-24: zhes brjod pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
T02D1491:204a-25: de nas dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir snying ga'i
T02D1491:204a-26: yi ge h'um las 'od zer 'phros pas rigs lnga'i
T02D1491:204a-27: bde bar gshegs pa nam mkha' la byon par bsam
T02D1491:204a-28: mo // de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod de /
T02D1491:204a-29: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1491:204a-30: ji ltar mchog gnyis stsol mdzad ltar //
T02D1491:204a-31: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1491:204a-32: nam mkha' rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D1491:204a-33: zhes gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1491:204a-34: de nas mi bskyod rdo rje gtso bor gyur ba'i
T02D1491:204a-35: thugs ka nas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bum
T02D1491:204a-37: rdo rje chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02D1491:204a-38: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa'i //
T02D1491:204a-39: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi //
T02D1491:204a-40: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02D1491:204a-41: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1491:204a-42: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02D1491:204a-43: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1491:204a-44: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D1491:204a-45: zhes pas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D1491:204a-46: de dag thams cad kyi dbul mi bskyod pa sa
T02D1491:204a-47: gnon gyis phyag can sku mdog sngon po rdo rje
T02D1491:204b-1: de nas ci nus su bsgom mo //
T02D1491:204b-2: de las skyon bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1491:204b-3: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-4: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ram sv'a h'a /
T02D1491:204b-5: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-6: aom sarba buddha d'a ki ni ya /
T02D1491:204b-7: badzra warnna n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-8: aom badzra bee ro tsan'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-9: aom d'i ki n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-10: aom l'a ma ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-11: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-12: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-13: aom k'a kla sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-14: aom au lu k'a sye h'u h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-15: aom sva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-16: aom s'u kar'a sye h'u h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-17: aom ya ma damsht'i n'i ye h'u h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-18: aom ya ma du t'i ye h'u h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-19: aom ya ma ma tha n'i ye h'u h'um phat /
T02D1491:204b-20: de nas ldang bar 'dod na dkyil 'khor rang gi thugs kar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1491:204b-21: phyag dang zhal thams cad rtsa ba'i zhal la bsdu /
T02D1491:204b-22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g-yas rdo rje /
T02D1491:204b-23: g-yon dril bu 'dzin pa bsgom mo //
T02D1491:204b-24: de ltar thun bzhir bsam mo //
T02D1491:204b-25: thun tha ma la skad cig mas dkyil 'khor du lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1491:204b-28: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1491:204b-29: de ltar thun bzhir bsgoms la thun tha ma la
T02D1491:204b-30: ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi snying
T02D1491:204b-32: nang bar ni sdar bshad pa thams cad bya'o //
T02D1491:204b-33: lha bcu gsum ma'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi mkhan
T02D1491:204b-34: po chen po d'i pam kar shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad
T02D1491:204b-36: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
